servinfo.title: Precautions on Refrigerant Recovery
servinfo.ptxt: When discharging refrigerant out of A/C system, always recover it by using refrigerant recovery and recycling equipment. Discharging refrigerant HFC-134a (R-134a) into atmosphere would cause adverse effect to environments.

attention3.ptxt: When handling recovery and recycling equipment, be sure to follow the instruction manual for the equipment.
